attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current level of tax on petrol, diesel etc is unacceptable. It is now getting to a point where the poorer members of society are being priced off the roads resulting in higher levels of unemployment due to most employers requirement for a person to have their own transport. Remove 10p per litre from fuel tax before this country does it for you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
